name: kA_hud
tagline: A functional but beautiful hud for TF2
body:
### Welcome to kA_hud
kA_hud (_kah-hud_) is a Team Fortress 2 hud based on the old discontinued version of yA_hud. It is designed to have a simple look while still maintaining a visual language that informs the player of what they need when they need it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
